Title: You Can't Fix This
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Courtney Kemp Agboh, Monica Mitchell, Safia Dirie (executive story editor), Jeff Dix (story editor), Monica Mitchell (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: When tragedy befalls the St. Patrick family, Ghost and Tommy seek retribution. Tasha tries to keep things together at home until she realizes it will be on her to prevent further disaster, causing her to seek help from an unlikely ally.
